video.title: Rastamouse
video.synopsis: Rastamouse is a cool crime-fighting mouse who teams with his friends Scratchy and Zoomer to solve mysteries on the colorful island of Mouseland.

episodes.synopsis: The teefing must be stopped when all the cheese in Mouseland disappears, leaving the baby mice at the orphanage mighty hungry.
episodes.title: Da Crucial Plan

episodes.synopsis: The Easy Crew are preparing to judge the talent show competition when the orphans' mini-bus goes missing.
episodes.title: Double Crossin' Diva

episodes.synopsis: As the members of the Easy Crew rehearse for the island dance contest, they're called away to investigate problems at the orphanage.
episodes.title: Bakin' and Breakin'

episodes.synopsis: When President Wensley Dale's new portrait goes missing, The Easy Crew must come up with an arty plan to find the lost masterpiece.
episodes.title: Da Missin' Masterpiece

episodes.synopsis: The Easy Crew instigate a swashbuckling plan on a hot and sunny day to track down a mystery pirate who's taken all the music in Mouseland.
episodes.title: For Real FM

episodes.synopsis: There's a super-cool director in town, making everyone go crazy for his new pirate movie. But how come no one's ever heard of this Spike Cheez?
episodes.title: Mice Camera Action

episodes.synopsis: It's too hot to jam, but The Easy Crew still have to work when they must arrange a surprise party to track down a very selfish mouse in Misty Falls.
episodes.title: Hot Hot Hot

episodes.synopsis: When Bandulu makes a special pie for a presidential celebration, the pie goes missing with just a few crumbs left in the baking tin.
episodes.title: Da President's Pie

episodes.synopsis: Random road works and bizarre diversions prevent a musical legend from performing with Da Easy Crew. Will Gladstone Brie's music festival be ruined?
episodes.title: Toots Re-Routes

episodes.synopsis: The orphans have been practicing hard to win the cheese 'n' spoon race on sports day, but some mouse seems determined to spoil all the fun.
episodes.title: Shorty Shapes Up

episodes.synopsis: "Zoomer worries about his place in the band, while Rastamouse and Scratchy investigate why everyone in Grovetown is so keen to snooze."
episodes.title: Boom Bada Boom

episodes.synopsis: Bandulu's promised to make the orphans his famous fruity slushed ice. But someone's stolen his stuff.
episodes.title: Da Ice Cold Criminal

episodes.synopsis: When items of clothing go missing right before the Mouseland fashion competition, the Easy Crew must help the president find his tie.
episodes.title: Wicked Threads

episodes.synopsis: Scratchy has been training hard for Da Big Cheese Marathon, but Rubba, who does no training at all, always seems to beat her.
episodes.title: Marathon Mystery

episodes.synopsis: It's the day of the Mouseland Cool Car Competition and strange things are happening around Grove Town, so Rastamouse has to catch a thief.
episodes.title: Da Cool Cruiser

episodes.synopsis: Scary sounds have been spooking the orphan mice during their camping trip, so Rastamouse investigates, accompanied by some great beat-boxing rhythms.
episodes.title: Da Monstrous Fib

episodes.synopsis: The Easy Crew investigate weird vibrations, strange rumbling sounds and tales of a rare treasure cheese buried deep in the Buff Bay Caves.
episodes.title: Cheesy Rumbles

episodes.synopsis: When the president heads out for a well-deserved day off, his bossy sister informs everyone that he's left her in charge.
episodes.title: Pie Without Cheese?

episodes.synopsis: Scratchy's itching to open her roller-skate disco but first The Easy Crew must investigate a copy-cat criminal and a two-time crime.
episodes.title: Rollin' Ragga Twins

episodes.synopsis: Rastamouse comes up with a watertight plan to track down a presidential impersonator and fix the orphanage's leaky roof.
episodes.title: Master of Disguise

episodes.synopsis: Old school music star Lady Uptown is distressed by the disappearance of her lucky diamond brooch, and The Easy Crew search for the missing bling.
episodes.title: Lady Uptown

episodes.synopsis: Zoomer's swapped his skates for the latest sneakers, and The Easy Crew need all their smarts to catch an unusual thief who keeps putting things back.
episodes.title: Sole Rebel

episodes.synopsis: It's the Grovetown food festival, but Bandulu has lost his scrapbook containing all his recipes, so the Easy Crew cook up a hot plan to save the day.
episodes.title: Hot Sauce

episodes.synopsis: The Easy Crew track down a musician with a wicked hip-hop vibe who has been "borrowing" the orphans for his audience without asking.
episodes.title: Da Bing-A Bling

episodes.synopsis: Rastamouse, Scratchy and Zoomer are on the case when somebody steals an Easy Crew record and pretends the music is their own.
episodes.title: Sugacube

episodes.synopsis: The members of The Easy Crew are rushing to finish recording their new single, but their rival, MC Rhymes, also has his eye on the top of the charts.
episodes.title: Da Rhymin Teef

episodes.synopsis: A missing movie screen and a missing president! The Easy Crew find Wensley Dale before Spike Cheez can stage the premiere of his latest movie.
episodes.title: Missin' Da Prez

episodes.synopsis: It's up to The Easy Crew to find the reason behind the holes in Wensley Dale's lawn, strange dents in a car and a smashed window at the orphanage.
episodes.title: Da Swingin' Suspect

episodes.synopsis: Rastamouse comes up with a crafty plan to catch a trading card-craving criminal with a passion for collecting.
episodes.title: Swap Til Ya Drop

episodes.synopsis: The Easy Crew come up with a powerful plan to prove that reading really rocks and then investigate reports of lights going out all over town.
episodes.title: Ready Red

episodes.synopsis: Wensley Dale is trapped inside his mansion, and The Easy Crew must get out there and stop a messy mouse who is dumping rubbish all over the island
episodes.title: Da Rubbish Playground

episodes.synopsis: Some ragamuffin mouse has stolen Aunt Janessa's favorite wig and Wensley Dale is most concerned, so The Easy Crew are on the case!
episodes.title: Where da Hair?

episodes.synopsis: Sasha is having a massive clean-up to get rid of Wensley Dale's old comic books and junk, but she needs The Easy Crew's help to get the job done.
episodes.title: Da Rare Groove

episodes.synopsis: The first snow in Mouseland falls on Mousetego Bay! And Rastamouse investigates when the flour from the windmill is missing so there are no muffins.
episodes.title: S'no Flour

episodes.synopsis: Rastamouse and Zoomer must investigate when mysterious ginger beer bottles wash up on the shore at Mousetego Bay.
episodes.title: Message in a bottle

episodes.synopsis: Rastamouse is helping Toots, so Scratchy and Zoomer have a case of their own when the orphans wake up to find that all of their yoyos are missing.
episodes.title: Hand Made Music
